Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Kostner/5th
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, and Harrision, due to, street blockage, near Kostner/5th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, and Harrision, due to, street blockage, near Kostner/5th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
